search.query: index=_internal sourcetype=scheduler result_count | extract pairdelim=",", kvdelim="=", auto=f | stats avg(result_count) min(result_count) max(result_count), sparkline(avg(result_count)) AS sparkline avg(run_time) min(run_time) max(run_time) sum(run_time) values(eval(if(match(host, "^splunksh(?:1|2|3)$"), "SHC", host))) AS hosts count AS execution_count by savedsearch_name, app | rename savedsearch_name AS title | makemv delim="," values(host)

table.title: Scheduled searches that are running in multiple places (SHC is considered 1 host)

search.query: | eval host_count=mvcount(hosts) | makemv delim="," hosts | where app!="TA-fire_brigade" AND host_count > 1

table.title: Searches that are scheduled to run more frequently then they take to finish

search.query: index=_internal sourcetype=scheduler skipped OR continued | extract pairdelim=",", kvdelim="=", auto=f | search status!="delegated*" status!="success" | stats values(app) values(eval(if(match(host, "^splunksh(?:1|2|3)$"), "SHC", host))) AS hosts count AS execution_count values(status) by savedsearch_name | sort - execution_count
